title: [仅供娱乐]灌水五十九首（其四）翻译
author: 郁离子
txt_content:
书接上回：灌水五十九首（其三）翻译
原文：
有水同车，水如木板。
将水茶馆，佩水龙头。
彼水高超，水贴且逃。

有水同行，水如mo hui。
将水末地，佩水瓶罐。
彼水高超，水贴不忘。 

翻译
Some water is taking a car with me(这句有点奇怪，没办法，原作就很奇怪）.The water is like glowing planks.
I'll pour water into the miners' teahouse,like a water tap.
You can pour water so well that the other watery posts run away.

I go with some water,the water is like mohui666.
I'll pour water into the end,like a bottle full of water.
You can pour water so well that I won't forget your watery posts.

replies.author: 一只小水怪
replies.txt_content:
这是机翻：
Water is like a plank.
Will water teahouse, wear tap.
The water is superb, and the water sticks and escapes.

Water is like water.
Put water on the ground and carry water bottles and cans.
The water is superb, the water stick will not forget.
这是机翻翻译回来的东西：
水就像木板。
会给茶馆浇水，戴水龙头。
水很好，水粘在一起就跑了。

水就像水。
把水放在地上，拿着水瓶和水罐。
水是上乘的，水棒是不会忘记的。

replies.author: 一只小水怪
replies.txt_content: 其实代数可以把mo hui改为默绘（他的B站号）

replies.author: 酥宁最酥啦
replies.txt_content: 可以 这里叫做 氵怪广场

还以为能氵50多次呢
